attributes.action: give each of the four countries which make up great britain the right to become independent countries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is time that the people should be allowed to decide the future of their home nation. Let us decide whether Scotland
Wales
Ireland
England 
should be independent from one another and countries in their own right once more.
It is time to stop lying to the people about who subsidizes who. It is time that the government allowed US to decide on our own futures

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
